ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: SHA-3 cryptographic hash and SHAKE256 extendable-output functions (XOF). The SHA-3 Secure Hash Standard was published by the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) in 2015 at <doi:10.6028/NIST.FIPS.202>. Fast and memory-efficient implementation using the core algorithm from 'Mbed TLS' under the Trusted Firmware Project <https://www.trustedfirmware.org/projects/mbed-tls/>.

SHA-3 cryptographic hash and SHAKE256 extendable-output functions (XOF). The SHA-3 Secure Hash Standard was published by the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) in 2015 at <doi:10.6028/NIST.FIPS.202>. Fast and memory-efficient implementation using the core algorithm from 'Mbed TLS' under the Trusted Firmware Project <https://www.trustedfirmware.org/projects/mbed-tls/>.

name: r-secretbase

about.summary: SHA-3 cryptographic hash and SHAKE256 extendable-output functions (XOF). The SHA-3 Secure Hash Standard was published by the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) in 2015 at <doi:10.6028/NIST.FIPS.202>. Fast and memory-efficient implementation using the core algorithm from 'Mbed TLS' under the Trusted Firmware Project <https://www.trustedfirmware.org/projects/mbed-tls/>.

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.1.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-secretbase
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/secretbase_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/secretbase/secretbase_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: b33bf47e1dfa10e3df5a65dd1ae8916d2321082de05809e38c317aecfb9fb661

build:
  number: 0
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/
  missing_dso_whitelist:
    - '*/R.dll'  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}              # [not win]
    - {{ stdlib("c") }}                # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_c') }}        # [win]
    - {{ stdlib("c") }}                # [win]
    - {{ posix }}filesystem        # [win]
    - {{ posix }}make
    - {{ posix }}sed               # [win]
    - {{ posix }}coreutils         # [win]
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('secretbase')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('secretbase')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://shikokuchuo.net/secretbase/
  dev_url: https://github.com/shikokuchuo/secretbase/
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  summary: SHA-3 cryptographic hash and SHAKE256 extendable-output functions (XOF). The SHA-3 Secure Hash Standard was published by the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) in 2015 at <doi:10.6028/NIST.FIPS.202>. Fast and memory-efficient implementation using the core algorithm from 'Mbed TLS' under the
    Trusted Firmware Project <https://www.trustedfirmware.org/projects/mbed-tls/>.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - brendanf

# Package: secretbase
# Type: Package
# Title: Cryptographic Hash and Extendable-Output Functions
# Version: 0.2.0
# Description: SHA-3 cryptographic hash and SHAKE256 extendable-output functions (XOF). The SHA-3 Secure Hash Standard was published by the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) in 2015 at <doi:10.6028/NIST.FIPS.202>. Fast and memory-efficient implementation using the core algorithm from 'Mbed TLS' under the Trusted Firmware Project <https://www.trustedfirmware.org/projects/mbed-tls/>.
